channel.title: About on Svtter's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in About on Svtter's Blog

item.title: 😄 About Me
item.description:
Hello, my friend. I’m svtter. I’m studying CS at USTB and pursuing a PhD degree.

I’m an open-source lover and a continuous startup creator. I believe in the Mozilla Manifesto.

My email is YmxvZ0BzdnR0ZXIuY24=. Your letters are welcome.

News

  • 2024/05/17: Published new work A Human-In-One-Loop Active Domain Adaptation Framework for Digit Recognition
  • 2023/09: Preparing the Doctoral Dissertation Proposal.
  • 2023/09/09: Resigned from CTO position @Thinghoo. New position: Technical Adviser @Thinghoo.
  • 2022/11/01: Released my source code on a new platform: sourcehut!

Projects

  • Platform M: a material application platform. Avaiable at 2025-10.
  • HIOL: An human in one loop active learning framework.
  • Meterhub: A free online meter reading recognition service - 🔥 Available at 2025-03!

Publications

  • 2024: A Human-In-One-Loop Active Domain Adaptation Framework for Digit Recognition
  • 2022: HRC-mCNNs: A Hybrid Regression and Classification Multibranch CNNs for Automatic Meter Reading With Smart Shell

Community

  • 烟知

🤼 Friends

他们的站似乎不维护了。🥹

  • Kinice
  • It-tree
  • 老曹

item.title: 关于
item.description:
日拱一卒，可至千里。

你好，朋友，我是 svtter。我正在北科大攻读计算机科学的博士学位。

我是一个开源爱好者，也是一个连续创业者。我信奉Mozilla 宣言。

我的邮箱是blog@svtter.cn。

我十分欢迎商业合作与技术交流，欢迎与我联系。

News

  • 2025/05/29: Published new work Sliding Window Regression Method for Mechanical Meter Reading Recognition in Time-Series Images.
  • 2024/05/17: Published new work A Human-In-One-Loop Active Domain Adaptation Framework for Digit Recognition
  • 2023/09: Preparing the Doctoral Dissertation Proposal.
  • 2023/09/09: Resigned from CTO position @Thinghoo. New position: Technical Adviser @Thinghoo.
  • 2022/11/01: Released my source code on a new platform: sourcehut!

Projects

  • Platform M: a material application platform. Avaiable at 2025-10.
  • HIOL: An human in one loop active learning framework.
  • Meterhub: A free online meter reading recognition service - 🔥 Available at 2025-03!

Open Source Projects

基于大模型的 pdf 阅读器，可以从 pdf 中提取结构化的数据。。

一个用于管理文献的 library

使用视觉模型进行仪表识别

Publications

  • 2025: Sliding Window Regression Method for Mechanical Meter Reading Recognition in Time-Series Images
  • 2024: A Human-In-One-Loop Active Domain Adaptation Framework for Digit Recognition
  • 2022: HRC-mCNNs: A Hybrid Regression and Classification Multibranch CNNs for Automatic Meter Reading With Smart Shell
